page.title: 10THE SHOP & THE BUTCHERS
page.content:
{THE SHOP The small grocery supermarket is situated at the crossroads in the centre of the village. The shop is open each week day and Saturdays with early closing on Thursdays. Newspapers may be bought there, having been delivered by bus at 12.50am. Milk may be purchased from the shop, but early morning deliveries are not made to homes. The milk cartons are put out at various places in the village by the shopkeeper and customers go to collect the number of pints they have ordered. Customers pay for their milk weekly at the shop.
BUTCHERS A family firm runs the butcher shop in the village, and they have 3 mobile butchers shops which travel through out the eastern side of the county.
